statements: DELETE FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123abc' AND recipient_address = '0x456def' AND is_suspicious = TRUE;
DELETE FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE is_suspicious = true AND sender_address = '0xAbCdEf123456'
DELETE FROM transaction_metadata WHERE metadata_id = 1 AND metadata_key = 'note';
DELETE FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'sender123' AND receiver_address = 'receiver456' AND amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM ai_analysis WHERE classification = 'Suspicious' AND confidence < 0.8;
